official.headline: Access Patterns Shift
official.anchor_line: This morning, residents in several districts experienced realignment of BCI access privileges, reflecting the system’s ongoing commitment to citywide balance.
official.contextual_reframing: These adaptive adjustments ensure fair and efficient distribution of services, reinforcing Stenograd’s stability and progress for all citizens.

underground.headline: System Flips Out
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd wakes to chaos—model citizens locked out, old outcasts suddenly on top after the BCI’s scores reverse overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: Word on the net is a sabotaged algorithm or a desperate move by the Council. The score was always a game, and now the rules are showing their cracks for everyone to see.
